text.text: High-grade silver vein at Castle East initially discovered at a depth of 400m during diamond drilling from the surface. Additional discoveries in first of drill core for CS-19-08-W01 (50,583 g/t Ag over 0.6m at 427m vertical depth) and then CW19-08-W-02 (70,380 g/t Ag over 0.3m at 418m vertical depth)
